name: Aer Arann ATR-42 Departing from Isle of Man
description:
Onboard Aer Arann ATR42-300 EI-BYO, taxying and taking off from Isle of Man (Ronaldsway) Airport runway 26, on our flight to Dublin, Ireland.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y

✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈

Would you like to view my full flight videos ahead of everyone else, and support inflight Video at the same time?  Please consider supporting me on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/inflightvideo.  Patrons get early access to all of my full length, full flight videos, as well as other perks including access to giveaways, freebies, and regular live chats to talk about what's coming soon for inflight Video!
